arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا سَنَسۡتَدۡرِجُهُم مِّنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
translation: (182) But those who deny Our signs - We will progressively lead them [to destruction][427] from where they do not know.
footnotes: [427]- Allāh will test them with one favor after another in spite of their disobedience, which only increases them in arrogance and sin.
